title: Writing throwing functions
question: This code is valid Swift – true or false?
hint: Check that throwing functions are marked throws, and that their error case exists and conforms to Error.

wrong.reason: The buyAlcohol() function cannot throw errors, because it is not marked using throws.
The ChargeError enum does not conform to Error.
The WifiError enum doesn't define a badPassword case.
The switch block is not exhaustive.
The readItem() function cannot throw errors, because it is not marked using throws.
